div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 510 Viisoara, c. 25 km. E of Turnu Magu- rele, Rumania, 1942 Burial: c. 150-125 B.C. (T) Contents: 280 AR. Pot hoard Macedonia, 1st Region: 122 tetradr. Thasos: 13 spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) 135 as listed Moisil, Balcania 1944, p. 12, illus.
